subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Officials from Nascar and Goodyear may make changes after the Allstate 400 at the Brickyard on Sunday disintegrated into a tire-pulverizing fiasco.
snippet: Officials from Nascar and Goodyear may make changes after the Allstate 400 at the Brickyard on Sunday disintegrated into a tire-pulverizing fiasco.
